HotelElement.Name: Norfolk Luxury Beachfront Apartments Gold Coast

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Norfolk Luxury Beachfront Apartments in Main Beach, you'll be convenient to King Tutts Putt Putt and Sea World. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Mariner's Cove Marina and Budds Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in of the guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and DVD players are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include washers/dryers and irons/ironing boards, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (surcharge).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional amenities include babysitting/childcare and barbecue grills.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services and an elevator (lift).


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
